annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.

conditions.message: reconcile PodDisruptionBudget for mongos: PodDisruptionBudget.policy "test-cluster-mongos-" is invalid: [spec: Invalid value: policy.PodDisruptionBudgetSpec{MinAvailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc007e1f220), Selector:(*v1.LabelSelector)(0xc007e1f240), MaxUnavailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc007e1f280)}: minAvailable and maxUnavailable cannot be both set, spec.minAvailable: Invalid value: intstr.IntOrString{Type:1, IntVal:0, StrVal:"ACTOKEY"}: a valid percent string must be a numeric string followed by an ending '%' (e.g. '1%',  or '93%', regex used for validation is '[0-9]+%')]

reconcile PodDisruptionBudget for mongos: PodDisruptionBudget.policy "test-cluster-mongos-" is invalid: [spec: Invalid value: policy.PodDisruptionBudgetSpec{MinAvailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc0072bff40), Selector:(*v1.LabelSelector)(0xc0072bff80), MaxUnavailable:(*intstr.IntOrString)(0xc0072bffa0)}: minAvailable and maxUnavailable cannot be both set, spec.minAvailable: Invalid value: intstr.IntOrString{Type:1, IntVal:0, StrVal:"ACTOKEY"}: a valid percent string must be a numeric string followed by an ending '%' (e.g. '1%',  or '93%', regex used for validation is '[0-9]+%')]
